Class TrafficUser

java.lang.Object
cars.TrafficUser
All Implemented Interfaces:
Activeable, Stoppable, Serializable, Cloneable
Direct Known Subclasses:
Automobile, Police
public abstract class TrafficUser extends Object implements Stoppable, Cloneable, Serializable
Abstract base class representing an entity that can move within a 2D grid, with controllable activity and stoppable behavior. Implements Stoppable, Cloneable, and Serializable.
See Also:

      public void move(int dx, int dy) throws InactiveException, OutOfBoundsException
      Moves the entity by a delta (dx, dy).
      Parameters:
      dx - X delta
      dy - Y delta
      Throws:
      InactiveException - if not active
      OutOfBoundsException - if movement exceeds grid bounds

    • move

      public void move(double angleRad, double r) throws InactiveException, OutOfBoundsException
      Moves the entity in a given direction and distance.
      Parameters:
      angleRad - angle in radians
      r - distance to move
      Throws:
      InactiveException - if not active
      OutOfBoundsException - if movement exceeds grid bounds
